title.label: Task Title
title.description: Briefly describe what you want to do.

determined.label: Planned for
determined.description: Specify the exact time you want to complete this task.

duration.label: Expected Duration
duration.description: How long do you expect this task to take (e.g., 1 hour 30 minutes)

wasted.label: Wasted Time
wasted.description: How much time was actually spent on execution (e.g., 45 minutes)

time.label: Planned Time
time.count_time: How much time do you need?
time.description: How much time do you want to dedicate to this task?

priority.label: Priority
priority.description: How important is this task for today?
